payload.title: EventBus Class - Core Implementation
payload.description: Implement complete EventBus class with IEventStream interface, publish/subscribe functionality, subscription management, error isolation, and performance optimization for high-throughput scenarios.
payload.notes: EventBus class implemented with Node.js EventEmitter foundation. Features: publish/subscribe with type safety, unique subscription IDs, error isolation with wrapped handlers, performance optimization with 100 max listeners, wildcard subscriptions, and comprehensive subscription management.
